resources:
Millennio
//TUTORIAL Choose a language next Welcome to Millennio! Guess the year in which a historic event happened, something was invented, a movie, videogame or book was released The game You start every game with a set number of points depending on the category, you find them at the top of the screen For every correct answer you will gain points, but if you are wrong you will lose the difference between the correct answer and yours Answer as many questions as you can, the game ends if you run out of points Good luck!
//MENU ACTIVITY New Game SinglePlayer One vs One statistics share English Share with a friend DRAW
Easy: Hard: Games Correct Answers last 10 years most influential
//ACTIVITY START play
Initial Points: Points on correct answer: minimum year:
score : 0
//ANSWER ACTIVITY close Result :
//RESULT ACTIVITY NEW High Score High Score GAME OVER Try Again Exit
//MULTIPLAYER PLAYER winner
//CATEGORIE CATEGORIES HISTORY INVENTIONS MOVIES VIDEOGAMES LITERATURE SINGLES ALBUMS
easy hard
average score
"The Romans are defeated by the Germans in the battle of Teutoburg"
"The Romans start the invasion of Great Britain"
"The fire of Rome starts the first mass persecution of the Christians"
